name: Import CSV or XML Datafeed With Ease
author: Smackcoders

sections.description:
Tired of wasting time on manual uploads? Our powerful CSV/XML Importer plugin lets you migrate your data to WordPress in minutes, not hours. Easily import blog posts, products, users, custom fields, and more with unmatched speed and accuracy.

Key Benefits:

  • Save time: Import hundreds or thousands of items in minutes instead of hours.
  • Wide import compatibility: Import a diverse range of content including WooCommerce, Yoast, WPML, and more.
  • Reduce errors: Minimize data entry mistakes and ensure accurate migration.

Explore our Free Demo. Ready for more? Try our Private Trial.

User-Friendly Interface

  • Easy Navigation for Seamless Imports: Easily upload and import your CSV or XML files in just a few simple steps.
  • Intuitive mapping: Quickly match your data fields to WordPress fields using drag and drop.
  • Real-time progress: Monitor the import process and identify any issues.

Flexible File Uploads

  • Import from various sources: Upload files from your computer, a URL, or FTP/SFTP.
  • Support for multiple formats: Import CSV, XML, and other popular file formats.
  • Customizable options: Fine-tune the import process to meet your needs.

Accurate Imports

  • Detailed logs: Review import logs to track progress and troubleshoot any errors.
  • Download failed media: Easily identify and fix issues with image or media imports.
  • Validation checks: Ensure data integrity and prevent errors during the import process.

Unlimited Imports

  • Import as many items as you need: No limits on the number of posts, products, or other content you can import.
  • Efficient processing: Handle large datasets without performance issues.
  • Bulk import for time-saving: Import multiple items at once to streamline your workflow.

Automatic Media Handling

  • Import images along with content: Automatically link and display images within your posts or products.
  • SEO-optimized imports: Add alt text and titles to images for better search engine visibility.
  • Efficient media management: Easily manage large media libraries without manual uploads.

Organized Content

  • Import categories, tags, and taxonomies: Maintain a well-structured website with organized content.
  • Preserve relationships: Import hierarchical relationships between categories and terms.
  • Custom taxonomy support: Import custom post types and their associated taxonomies.

Top CSV Import Features

  • Easy Preparation: Use Google Sheets, Excel, or any spreadsheet tool to create or edit CSV files.
  • Seamless Mapping: Automatically match your CSV fields to WordPress fields for quick imports.
  • ACF Field Support: Import Advanced Custom Fields (ACF) for custom data. Free version supports Basic, Choices, and jQuery fields.

WordPress XML Import

For those preferring structured data, the plugin fully supports XML imports. With XML, you can ensure your data structure remains intact during migration.

Top XML Import Features:

  • Direct Import: Import data directly from XML files, no extra steps required.
  • Structured Data Transfer: Maintain data integrity and structure, minimizing errors.
  • Custom Content Import: Bring in custom post types like products, events, or portfolios.
  • Full Taxonomy Import: Keep your categories, tags, and taxonomies intact.

WordPress Import & Export Plugins as Addon

Streamline your WooCommerce store setup with bulk product imports from CSV or XML files. Easily manage product attributes, variations, and images.

WooCommerce Import Features:

  • Bulk Product Import: Upload hundreds of products, including variations, at once.
  • Seamless Integration: Import images, categories, and product attributes in one go.
  • Flexible Data Sources: Import product data from CSV, XML, or Excel formats.

Need more? Install our WooCommerce Import Addon for advanced import features like orders and coupons.

Media and Image Import

Our plugin handles bulk image imports along with your posts and pages. Add SEO-friendly titles, captions, and alt text to images directly from CSV/XML files. Managing large media libraries has never been easier.

Media Import Features:

  • SEO-Optimized Imports: Automatically add alt text and titles to images.
  • Efficient Bulk Uploads: Import images from external sources directly into your WordPress Media Library.

User Import and Export Addon

Easily manage users on your WordPress site with bulk import and export features. Whether you’re adding new members or migrating from another platform, this plugin simplifies the process.

User Import Features:

  • Bulk User Import: Upload thousands of users with details like email, username, and roles.
  • Secure Imports: Import hashed passwords for users without compromising security.

For even more user management, try our WordPress Users & Members Import Addon.

Premium Features

Upgrade to our Pro version to unlock advanced features like:

  • ACF & Custom Field Import: Supports ACF, JetEngine, CMB2, and Toolset fields.
  • Multilingual Support: Compatible with WPML, qTranslate X, and Polylang.
  • WooCommerce Data: Import products, variations, orders, and more with full control.
  • Yoast SEO Integration: Import SEO data like meta titles and descriptions.
  • Scheduled Imports: Automate imports by scheduling them in the background.
  • Advanced Export Options: Filter and export your WordPress content into different formats.

Explore WP Ultimate CSV Importer Pro Features.

Ready to Get Started?

  • Try Our Free Demo
  • Play with Our Private Trial
  • Check Out Our Documentation

Watch Our YouTube Tutorials

(youtube https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=M78qYD89B8c&list=PL2k3Ck1bFtbTT-5Tz2PLkoAUJ1fRdwUSj&index=2)
sections.installation:
It is as simple as installing any other WordPress plugin. There are two general methods:

From Admin Page

Go to Plugins -> Add New
Search for WP Ultimate CSV Importer
Click Install Now -> Activate
sections.faq:
How to Import Data into WordPress?

There are two main ways to import data into WordPress:

  1. Direct Upload: This is the simplest method and involves uploading your data file (CSV or XML) directly to WordPress. You can do this by going to Tools > Import.
  2. Plugins: For more advanced features and control, you can use a plugin like the Ultimate CSV Importer. This plugin allows you to import various file formats, including CSV and XML and offers features like automatic image handling and mapping of data fields.

Why Use CSV and XML for WordPress Imports?

  • CSV (Comma-Separated Values): Ideal for users familiar with spreadsheets like Excel. CSV files offer a visual way to audit, edit, and update data before import, saving time and minimizing manual work within WordPress.

  • XML (Extensible Markup Language): Suitable for structured data. XML files maintain data integrity during migration but require a basic understanding of their structure for editing the source file.

How to Use the Ultimate CSV and XML WordPress Importer?

The plugin offers both export and import functionalities:

  • Export: Use the export feature to create a sample CSV or XML file from your existing content. This file can then be used as a template for your import file or for importing data to another WordPress site.

  • Import: You can use the import functionality to:

    • Update existing posts with new values.
    • Add new posts to your website.
    • Update or replace existing content based on your mapping configuration.

How to Import a WordPress Site from Localhost?

If you’ve developed your site locally using XAMPP or WAMP, you can easily export it for deployment on a remote host. Here’s how:

  1. Use the export tab within the plugin after finalizing development and customization.
  2. Leverage advanced filters to exclude unwanted content and ensure a clean import on your remote server.

This method is also helpful for:

  • Building new sites locally and migrating existing content from an old server.
  • Restoring your site after migrating it to a new server.

How to Validate a CSV File for WordPress Import?

Missing or misplaced characters can cause import failures. It’s crucial to validate your CSV file before importing it into WordPress. You can use a free tool like “CSV Lint” to identify any errors and their locations for correction.

What is an XML File?

An XML document is a structured format for storing data. It consists of elements and other markups arranged in a specific hierarchy. Properly formatted XML files simplify the import process for your WordPress site.

Can I Get Sample Files for Testing the Import?

Yes! Download free sample CSV files specifically designed for testing the import functionality with the Ultimate CSV Importer plugin: Link to Sample CSV Files

WordPress Posts Not Showing After Import – Why and How to Fix?

There are two main reasons why your posts might not be showing after import:

  1. Missing Mandatory Fields: Ensure all required fields in your import file have values assigned.
  2. wpdebug Setting: If the wpdebug value in your wp-config.php file is set to True, it might interfere with the import process. Set it to False before importing.

Why does My Images Import to the Media Library fail?

Here are some reasons why images might not be imported:

  1. Unsupported Formats: The plugin may not support the image format you’re trying to import.
  2. Permission Issues: The image URL might require public access for download.
  3. Domain or URL Issues: The image URL may be invalid or not secured (HTTPS).

How to Import WordPress Posts with Images?

There are two ways to import posts with images:

  1. Dedicated Image Column: Include a separate column in your import file specifically for featured images. Populate this column with the image URLs.
  2. Inline Images: Include image URLs directly within the post content using HTML tags.

How to Import All Images from External URLs?

In the plugin’s “Manage Media Uploads” section, enable the option “Download Post-Content External Images to Media”. This allows you to import images directly from various online sources (e.g., Google Images, Pexels, Dropbox) to your WordPress media library. Refer to the Media Handling in WordPress Importer documentation for more details.
sections.changelog:
7.12

Release date: 2024-10-21

New Feature: Added import support for WooCommerce orders, including personalized product details from PPOM (Personalized Product Option Manager) fields.
New Feature: Added export support for WooCommerce orders, with personalized product information generated from PPOM fields.

7.11.10

Release date: 2024-10-09

New Feature: Added support for importing and exporting JetEngine Custom Content Types (CCTs).

7.11.9

Release date: 2024-10-01

Added: Support for YITH Barcodes and Cost of Goods plugin.
Added: Import support for ACF Dashicon Field.

7.11.8

Release date: 2024-09-24

Added: Introducing WooCommerce Orders, Coupons import and export.
Improved: WooCommerce Products import and export via API.
Fixed: JetEngine Custom Fields import issues.
Resolved: Minor bugs.

7.11.7

Release date: 2024-09-04

Added: Support for WooCommerce Reviews Import.
Fixed: Minor issues in the media section.

7.11.6

Release date: 2024-08-13

Fixed: Custom field value with serialized format issue
Resolved: Missing pause resume option issue

7.11.5

Release date: 2024-08-06

Added: Language translation support for Media section content

Minor Enhancements

Improved handling of zip image uploads
Enhanced dropdown functionality for custom post types
Updated display for the media tab screen
Added reporting for failed image URLs with status codes 401, 403, 408, 502, and 504
Corrected media log and summary path

7.11.4

Release date: 2024-07-30

Enhancements

CSV Export for Media Details: Users can now download a comprehensive CSV file after importing media. This CSV includes columns for status, mediaid, mediaurl, filename, title, caption, alttext, and description.
CSV Export for Post Failed Image Details: Users can now download a detailed CSV file after importing posts. This CSV includes columns for mediaid, posttitle, postid, and actualurl.
Added New Media Import Tab: A new tab has been introduced, dedicated to media import and updates. This feature allows users to upload both local and external images directly.
Featured Image Metadata: Added new metadata options in the mapping section, including imagetitle, imagefilename, imagealttext, imagedescription, and imagecaption.
Enhanced Logging: Improved logging details for more comprehensive tracking of import and media processes. Post-import logs now display the count of images associated with the post and the count of any failed images.
Log Manager Improvement: Implemented a Log Manager where users can access and download summary logs, media logs, and failed media logs as CSV files.

7.11.3

Release date: 2024-07-16

Added: Import support for Toolset Types plugin basic fields.
Fixed: Posttitle mandatory not display in drag and drop section.
Fixed: Pods relationship field front end display issue.
Fixed: Product category image import issue.

7.11.2

Release date: 2024-06-25

Fixed: PHP Custom function imports getting 500 error issue.
Fixed: Resolved issue with one column csv file import.
Fixed: JetEngine relation post not assign issue.
Fixed: ACF taxonomy field and Relationship field value stores db issue.

7.11.1

Release date: 2024-05-28

Enhancements

Introducing the Elementor templates bulk export (addon) and import feature in a single CSV file format. This allows you to back up your Elementor templates as an easily portable single CSV file.

Introducing content import support for Posts, Pages, Custom Post Types (CPTs), and WooCommerce Products designed with Elementor, simplifying the content migration process for Elementor websites.

7.11.0

Release date: 2024-05-21

Enhancements

Introducing a new WPML import feature, enabling users to import multilingual content as posts and pages using the WordPress CSV Importer plugin for both CSV and XML files.

short_description: Import and migrate CSV/XML data into WordPress quickly and accurately. With our plugin, you can import/export posts, users, products, custom fields, a …
description:
Tired of wasting time on manual uploads? Our powerful CSV/XML Importer plugin lets you migrate your data to WordPress in minutes, not hours. Easily import blog posts, products, users, custom fields, and more with unmatched speed and accuracy.

Key Benefits:

  • Save time: Import hundreds or thousands of items in minutes instead of hours.
  • Wide import compatibility: Import a diverse range of content including WooCommerce, Yoast, WPML, and more.
  • Reduce errors: Minimize data entry mistakes and ensure accurate migration.

Explore our Free Demo. Ready for more? Try our Private Trial.

User-Friendly Interface

  • Easy Navigation for Seamless Imports: Easily upload and import your CSV or XML files in just a few simple steps.
  • Intuitive mapping: Quickly match your data fields to WordPress fields using drag and drop.
  • Real-time progress: Monitor the import process and identify any issues.

Flexible File Uploads

  • Import from various sources: Upload files from your computer, a URL, or FTP/SFTP.
  • Support for multiple formats: Import CSV, XML, and other popular file formats.
  • Customizable options: Fine-tune the import process to meet your needs.

Accurate Imports

  • Detailed logs: Review import logs to track progress and troubleshoot any errors.
  • Download failed media: Easily identify and fix issues with image or media imports.
  • Validation checks: Ensure data integrity and prevent errors during the import process.

Unlimited Imports

  • Import as many items as you need: No limits on the number of posts, products, or other content you can import.
  • Efficient processing: Handle large datasets without performance issues.
  • Bulk import for time-saving: Import multiple items at once to streamline your workflow.

Automatic Media Handling

  • Import images along with content: Automatically link and display images within your posts or products.
  • SEO-optimized imports: Add alt text and titles to images for better search engine visibility.
  • Efficient media management: Easily manage large media libraries without manual uploads.

Organized Content

  • Import categories, tags, and taxonomies: Maintain a well-structured website with organized content.
  • Preserve relationships: Import hierarchical relationships between categories and terms.
  • Custom taxonomy support: Import custom post types and their associated taxonomies.

Top CSV Import Features

  • Easy Preparation: Use Google Sheets, Excel, or any spreadsheet tool to create or edit CSV files.
  • Seamless Mapping: Automatically match your CSV fields to WordPress fields for quick imports.
  • ACF Field Support: Import Advanced Custom Fields (ACF) for custom data. Free version supports Basic, Choices, and jQuery fields.

WordPress XML Import

For those preferring structured data, the plugin fully supports XML imports. With XML, you can ensure your data structure remains intact during migration.

Top XML Import Features:

  • Direct Import: Import data directly from XML files, no extra steps required.
  • Structured Data Transfer: Maintain data integrity and structure, minimizing errors.
  • Custom Content Import: Bring in custom post types like products, events, or portfolios.
  • Full Taxonomy Import: Keep your categories, tags, and taxonomies intact.

WordPress Import & Export Plugins as Addon

Streamline your WooCommerce store setup with bulk product imports from CSV or XML files. Easily manage product attributes, variations, and images.

WooCommerce Import Features:

  • Bulk Product Import: Upload hundreds of products, including variations, at once.
  • Seamless Integration: Import images, categories, and product attributes in one go.
  • Flexible Data Sources: Import product data from CSV, XML, or Excel formats.

Need more? Install our WooCommerce Import Addon for advanced import features like orders and coupons.

Media and Image Import

Our plugin handles bulk image imports along with your posts and pages. Add SEO-friendly titles, captions, and alt text to images directly from CSV/XML files. Managing large media libraries has never been easier.

Media Import Features:

  • SEO-Optimized Imports: Automatically add alt text and titles to images.
  • Efficient Bulk Uploads: Import images from external sources directly into your WordPress Media Library.

User Import and Export Addon

Easily manage users on your WordPress site with bulk import and export features. Whether you’re adding new members or migrating from another platform, this plugin simplifies the process.

User Import Features:

  • Bulk User Import: Upload thousands of users with details like email, username, and roles.
  • Secure Imports: Import hashed passwords for users without compromising security.

For even more user management, try our WordPress Users & Members Import Addon.

Premium Features

Upgrade to our Pro version to unlock advanced features like:

  • ACF & Custom Field Import: Supports ACF, JetEngine, CMB2, and Toolset fields.
  • Multilingual Support: Compatible with WPML, qTranslate X, and Polylang.
  • WooCommerce Data: Import products, variations, orders, and more with full control.
  • Yoast SEO Integration: Import SEO data like meta titles and descriptions.
  • Scheduled Imports: Automate imports by scheduling them in the background.
  • Advanced Export Options: Filter and export your WordPress content into different formats.

Explore WP Ultimate CSV Importer Pro Features.

Ready to Get Started?

  • Try Our Free Demo
  • Play with Our Private Trial
  • Check Out Our Documentation

Watch Our YouTube Tutorials

(youtube https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=M78qYD89B8c&list=PL2k3Ck1bFtbTT-5Tz2PLkoAUJ1fRdwUSj&index=2)

upgrade_notice.7.12: Added: import support for WooCommerce orders, including personalized product details from PPOM (Personalized Product Option Manager) fields. Added: export support for WooCommerce orders, with personalized product information generated from PPOM fields.
